com.percussion.search
Class PSExecutableSearchFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.search.PSExecutableSearchFactory

public class PSExecutableSearchFactory
extends Object

Factory class used to create instances of IPSExecutableSearch.

Method Detail

createExecutableSearch

public static IPSExecutableSearch createExecutableSearch(Object context,
                                                         Collection columnNames,
                                                         PSSearch search)
Create an executable search with a search object and a list of result column names.

Parameters:
context - the context used to execute the search request against the Rhythmyx server, it may not be null. Must be an instance of a PSRequest, IPSRequestContext, or IPSRemoteRequester.
columnNames - the names of the columns to include in the search results as String objects, may not be null, may be empty. Additional system columns will be added to the results automatically, at least the following system columns will be returned, although others may be added as well:
  • sys_contentid
  • sys_title
search - the search object that defines the criteria, and result columns, may not be null.
Returns:
The executable search, never null.

createExecutableSearch

public static IPSExecutableSearch createExecutableSearch(Object context,
                                                         Collection columnNames,
                                                         Collection contentIds)
Construct an executable search with the supplied list of content ids as search criteria. Same as createExecutableSearch(Object, Collection, PSSearch), except that instead of a search object, a list of content ids is supplied. Only that parameter is described below.

Parameters:
contentIds - the list of content ids to search on as Integer objects, may not be null or empty.
